MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 postcode area of Llanilar, affecting properties in Rhosygarth, Pantglas and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations into the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:35AM on 25th February 2021
